DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether good take delavirdine ( DLV ) plus indinavir ( IDV ) plus zidovudine ( ZDV ) twice day three time day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Find Best Dosing Schedule Delavirdine , Zidovudine , Indinavir HIV-Positive Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients divide 2 treatment group ; group balance respect viral load . Group A receive ZDV , DLV , IDV 3 time daily . Group B receive ZDV , DLV , IDV 2 time daily . Patients evaluate change baseline viral load CD4 cell count .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria You may eligible study : Are HIVpositive . Have viral load ( level HIV blood ) least 20,000 copies/ml . Have CD4 cell count least 50 cells/mm3 . Are least 14 year old ( consent parent guardian require 18 ) . Exclusion Criteria You eligible study : Have ever take antiHIV drug ZDV . Have take ZDV 1 month .
